comments.text:
Created attachment 543643
Screenshot

User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:7.0a1) Gecko/20110702 Firefox/7.0a1
Build ID: 20110702030813

Steps to reproduce:

Pressed Ctrl-Tab and went to List all tabs


Actual results:

Didn't see a difference between App Tabs and normal tabs on Ctrl-Tab and "List all Tabs"


Expected results:

App tabs should have been distinct

comments.raw_text:
Can you reproduce it on a clean profile, do not install ant addons on it:
http://support.mozilla.com/kb/Basic+Troubleshooting#w_8-make-a-new-profile
comments.text:
Can you reproduce it on a clean profile, do not install ant addons on it:
http://support.mozilla.com/kb/Basic+Troubleshooting#w_8-make-a-new-profile
Ctrl-Tab is not a supported feature yet, but the list all tabs button is. Dao, should we file a new bug for Ctrl-Tab or can we handle both in a single bug?
comments.raw_text: Ctrl-Tab is not a supported feature yet, but the list all tabs button is. Dao, should we file a new bug for Ctrl-Tab or can we handle both in a single bug?

comments.raw_text:
(In reply to comment #3)
> Can you reproduce it on a clean profile, do not install ant addons on it:
> http://support.mozilla.com/kb/Basic+Troubleshooting#w_8-make-a-new-profile

Hi, I made clean profile, and updated Nightly, but the dialog would not show: eg, it just switched tabs, without the previews, like IE or Chrome.
I disabled ALL addons an my normal profile, but I can still see this dialog with the "previews" of tabs.
Has anyone ever seen that dialog before?
